translation.en: [man on tape, in Hindi] Gambling is a part of life.
translation.zh: ‎赌博是生活的一部分

translation.en: If not cricket, people would bet on something else.
translation.zh: ‎就算不赌板球 人们也会赌其他东西

translation.en: Our business thrives only by being illegal.
translation.zh:
‎我们的生意
‎就是依靠违法途径兴旺发达的

translation.en: If it's all cash, then it has to be black money.
translation.zh:
‎如果交易全都用现金进行
‎那它必定是黑钱

translation.en: We are villains, we are not heroes.
translation.zh: ‎我们是恶棍 不是英雄

translation.en: [Aniruddha Bahal, in English] I'm passionate about cricket like any Indian.
translation.zh: ‎我和其他所有印度公民一样热爱板球

translation.en: The game is a beautiful game.
translation.zh: ‎这是一项美妙的运动

translation.en: Poetry in motion.
translation.zh: ‎宛如一首律动的诗篇

translation.en: So, when I started sports reporting,
translation.zh: ‎所以 初入体育播报行业时

translation.en: I never imagined that I would be breaking the lid off anything.
translation.zh: ‎我从未想到自己会揭开其中的黑幕

translation.en: [commentator 1] And India's captain has reached his half-century.
translation.zh: ‎印度队的队长已取得50跑

translation.en: [commentator 2] That is out.
translation.zh: ‎出局

translation.en: [Bahal] For the millions of fans, these players were put on pedestals.
translation.zh:
‎这些球员
‎被成千上万的粉丝捧上了神坛

translation.en: They were gods.
translation.zh: ‎被视若神明

translation.en: But human beings are, uh, fallible.
translation.zh: ‎但人类容易行差踏错

translation.en: And when I started digging,
translation.zh: ‎当我开始挖掘背后的故事

translation.en: I found that, in truth,
translation.zh: ‎就发现 其实这项赛事

translation.en: it was a very different game
translation.zh: ‎与我们所想的截然不同

translation.en: and a very ugly game.
translation.zh: ‎而且丑陋不堪

translation.en: [reporter 1] The cricketing community has been stunned.
translation.zh: ‎板球界大为震惊

translation.en: You just get really angry. You just get so pissed off.
translation.zh: ‎人们真的很愤怒 ‎怒不可遏

translation.en: [reporter 2] Absolutely explosive.
translation.zh: ‎绝对是爆炸性的新闻

translation.en: What will happen next is impossible to say.
translation.zh: ‎接下来会如何 实在难以预料

translation.en: [Ravi Sawani] The kind of allegations being made,
translation.zh: ‎那些指控中陈述的罪状

translation.en: they were absolutely unbelievable.
translation.zh: ‎完全令人难以置信

translation.en: [Minty Tejpal] We came up with this plan to target and trap the cricketers
translation.zh:
‎我们计划使用隐藏摄像头
‎去套目标球员的话

translation.en: using spy cam equipment, and get the truth out.
translation.zh: ‎从而获取真相

translation.en: Treachery. Like you've been stabbed in the back.
translation.zh: ‎背叛 就像被人从背后捅了一刀

translation.en: [reporter 3] Now, serious concerns.
translation.zh: ‎现在 有一个严重的问题

translation.en: Can cricket survive?
translation.zh: ‎板球会从此一蹶不振吗？

translation.en: [commentator 1] Lovely shot. Glorious shot!
translation.zh: ‎好球 ‎漂亮的一击！

translation.en: [Sharda Ugra] The '90s was the era of superstardom in Indian cricket.
translation.zh:
‎20世纪90年代
‎是印度板球界明星荟萃的时代

translation.en: [commentator 2] And he's picked that up very cleanly.
translation.zh: ‎他干净利落地救起了那一球

translation.en: They became as famous and important as film stars.
translation.zh:
‎那些球员成了
‎像电影明星一样有名的大人物 ‎（莎达乌格拉
‎体育记者）

translation.en: [commentator 2] What a wonderful catch! That's a brilliant catch!
translation.zh: ‎真是精彩的接球！ ‎接得太棒了！

translation.en: The unpredictability, the beauty of it, the suspense unraveling…
translation.zh:
‎变幻莫测的局势、悬念的展开
‎正是球赛的美妙之处… ‎（斯里朗卡利
‎记者、作家）

translation.en: Anything could happen.
translation.zh: ‎一切皆有可能

translation.en: [commentator 2] Trouble! Big trouble.
translation.zh: ‎有麻烦了！大麻烦

translation.en: [Karri] It didn't matter who you are, where you came from,
translation.zh: ‎无论你是谁、来自哪里

translation.en: you can be the hero of the whole country.
translation.zh: ‎都可能成为国家的英雄

translation.en: [Ugra] We wanted to follow our stars.
translation.zh: ‎人们狂热追星

translation.en: [all chanting] India! India!
translation.zh: ‎印度！

translation.en: We saw almost a utopian version of what cricket is.
translation.zh:
‎我们将板球的世界
‎视为乌托邦式的完美国度

translation.en: But when it came to issues around gambling, I was completely naïve.
translation.zh:
‎但当涉及到赌博的问题时
‎我真的太天真了

translation.en: Betting is illegal in India.
translation.zh: ‎赌博在印度是违法的

translation.en: So when we started hearing about bookies,
translation.zh: ‎所以刚开始听闻有人设赌时

translation.en: we knew it wasn't good stuff,
translation.zh: ‎我们都知道那不是好消息

translation.en: but we were just rookie reporters. We didn't know what was going on.
translation.zh: ‎但我们只是新手记者 不清楚状况

translation.en: We needed someone to just unravel everything.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要有人来拨云见日

translation.en: [Bahal] Nobody sees the world as an investigative reporter.
translation.zh:
‎调查记者
‎会用与众不同的眼光来看世界

translation.en: See, initially, I never used to cover sports.
translation.zh: ‎起初我并非体育记者

translation.en: Then, uh, one of our journalists in Outlook, I think, he fell sick.
translation.zh:
‎后来我们《瞭望》杂志社的
‎一名记者生病了

translation.en: And so, I became a sports reporter by accident.
translation.zh: ‎我便在机缘巧合下成为了体育记者

translation.en: So I was always an outsider.
translation.zh: ‎我一直是个局外人

translation.en: I had few individual friends,
translation.zh: ‎我有少数几个同事朋友

translation.en: but I was never part of that club, so to speak.
translation.zh: ‎但我从未融入那个圈子 可以这么说

translation.en: They never broke stories.
translation.zh: ‎他们从来不爆料

translation.en: They never pointed the finger at negative stuff.
translation.zh: ‎也不会指责负面的东西

translation.en: And I felt that they owed their audience much more.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得他们应该
‎更努力地为读者挖掘新闻

translation.en: I remember '97…
translation.zh: ‎我记得1997年…

translation.en: I was sitting in the press box,
translation.zh: ‎我坐在记者席上

translation.en: and I noticed there was a whole sort of atmosphere of tension.
translation.zh: ‎注意到了某种紧张的气氛

translation.en: What was strange
translation.zh: ‎奇怪的是

translation.en: was some of the journalists would, uh, start getting calls.
translation.zh: ‎有些记者开始不停地接电话

translation.en: They were talking about what would happen in the match,
translation.zh: ‎他们在讲述比赛的现况

translation.en: who is being dropped, who is not being dropped,
translation.zh: ‎谁被换下场了 谁没有下场

translation.en: how is the pitch going to behave.
translation.zh: ‎球道上的表现如何

translation.en: He was giving them odds.
translation.zh: ‎他在给电话那头的人说赔率

translation.en: And then I realized that, "Oh, man! The calls were from bookies."
translation.zh:
‎然后我意识到
‎“天啊！电话是赌坊庄家打来的”

translation.en: You're not supposed to be talking to bookies from the press box.
translation.zh: ‎身在记者席 是不该和赌坊对话的

translation.en: That's an ethical concern.
translation.zh: ‎那是道德问题

translation.en: I felt a sense of outrage about it.
translation.zh: ‎我感到义愤填膺

translation.en: That set me thinking. "What the hell is happening?"
translation.zh: ‎我不禁开始思考：“发生了什么事？”

translation.en: How deep does it go? How big is the money?
translation.zh: ‎这件事的水有多深？涉及多大金额？

translation.en: So, I then started digging, so to speak.
translation.zh: ‎于是我开始进行调查

translation.en: And I managed to find some bookies.
translation.zh: ‎我找到了一些开盘口的庄家

translation.en: They wouldn't allow me to film them or take photographs.
translation.zh: ‎他们不接受拍摄和拍照

translation.en: In fact, they didn't even tell us their names.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 他们甚至拒绝透露姓名

translation.en: But eventually, some of them were willing to talk.
translation.zh: ‎但最终 有一部分人愿意开口了

translation.en: [bookie, in Hindi] Every bookie starts out as a punter.
translation.zh: ‎所有庄家一开始都是赌徒 ‎（匿名庄家的声音）

translation.en: In college, I had many vices, but no money.
translation.zh:
‎上大学时
‎我沾染了很多恶习 但是没钱

translation.en: Gambling was the quick fix.
translation.zh: ‎赌博是一条赚钱的捷径

translation.en: When I got addicted to money, I started making others play.
translation.zh:
‎当我迷上了赚钱的快感时
‎就开始做庄让别人下注

translation.en: To kickstart the work, we need a whole team.
translation.zh: ‎要想开始运作 我们需要一整个团队

translation.en: Many people call this a bookie den.
translation.zh: ‎很多人把它称作赌房

translation.en: We call it a shop.
translation.zh: ‎我们称之为赌坊

translation.en: [in English] It used to be a madhouse. And the phones used to be all abuzz.
translation.zh: ‎以前记者席非常喧闹 ‎电话声此起彼伏

translation.en: Wickets falling, runs being made, the odds would keep changing.
translation.zh:
‎三柱门被击倒了、跑位得分了
‎赔率瞬息万变

translation.en: So, back then, it all used to run on trust.
translation.zh:
‎那时候
‎赌坊的经营是建立在信用基础上的

translation.en: They have to know who you are for them to accept your bets.
translation.zh: ‎庄家只接受认识的人下注

translation.en: [bookie, in Hindi] Everyone is betting.
translation.zh: ‎赌客来自各行各业

translation.en: Maybe a shopkeeper, maybe a bank manager,
translation.zh: ‎店主‎、‎银行经理

translation.en: even college students, especially girls.
translation.zh: ‎甚至还有大学生 尤其是女生

translation.en: They think, "Yes, I can win this."
translation.zh: ‎人人都想着：“对 我能赢”

translation.en: It is a craze. Everybody wants to become rich.
translation.zh:
‎当时掀起了赌博狂潮
‎人人都想一夜暴富

translation.en: [in English] It was alarming. I remember some of them used to record those calls,
translation.zh:
‎情况令人担忧
‎我记得有些庄家会给电话录音

translation.en: so the punters couldn't go back on what they had bet on.
translation.zh: ‎以免赌客对之前的投注反悔

translation.en: [bookie, in Hindi] If you try to swindle us, you'll be in danger.
translation.zh: ‎你若想骗我们 当心吃不了兜着走

translation.en: The one who gambles never wins.
translation.zh: ‎赌徒永远不会是赢的一方

translation.en: The bookie never loses.
translation.zh: ‎庄家从来都立于不败之地

translation.en: This is the truth.
translation.zh: ‎这是事实

translation.en: [Ugra, in English] There was a great appetite for gambling,
translation.zh: ‎在印度 有很多好赌之人

translation.en: and it was pan-Indian like cricket.
translation.zh: ‎而板球又是风靡全国的运动

translation.en: You could bet on anything.
translation.zh: ‎你什么都可以赌

translation.en: So, what is the team score going to be after ten overs?
translation.zh:
‎比如十个回合后
‎球队的比分会是多少？

translation.en: How many sixes is a particular batsman going to hit?
translation.zh: ‎某位击球手会打出多少个六分打？

translation.en: Punters even place bets on field placings and bowling changes.
translation.zh:
‎甚至还有人下注
‎赌球员的分配位置和投球换位

translation.en: And so, for a bookie to have information gave them a huge advantage.
translation.zh:
‎所以赌坊只要掌握了内部消息
‎就占领了巨大优势

translation.en: Information was power at that time.
translation.zh:
‎在当时 信息就是力量 ‎（比赛
‎印度对南非）

translation.en: [Bahal] There were bookmakers giving us stories
translation.zh: ‎有些赌注登记人告诉我们

translation.en: about how in a particular match the bets swung very suspiciously.
translation.zh:
‎在一场比赛里
‎投注的变化有时候非常可疑

translation.en: It would raise suspicions, that somebody has inside information.
translation.zh:
‎这不禁令人怀疑
‎有人掌握了内幕消息

translation.en: What is that inside information?
translation.zh: ‎是什么样的内幕消息？

translation.en: That set me thinking,
translation.zh: ‎这让我开始思索

translation.en: did the bookies have power over the players?
translation.zh: ‎庄家是否有能力左右球员的表现？

translation.en: [all] Out!
translation.zh: ‎出局！

translation.en: In the '90s, cable television had come
translation.zh:
‎上世纪90年代
‎有线电视进入人们的生活

translation.en: and it brought Indian cricket into every village in the country.
translation.zh: ‎也将印度板球带进了全国各地的村庄

translation.en: And so, the greatest dream for any Indian boy of that generation
translation.zh: ‎所以那一代印度男孩最大的梦想

translation.en: was to play for India.
translation.zh: ‎就是加入印度国家队

translation.en: There was a sudden hope
translation.zh: ‎大家突然都满怀希望

translation.en: that even if you were from a small town,
translation.zh: ‎哪怕自己出身边远小镇

translation.en: you could become a hero.
translation.zh: ‎也可能成为国民英雄

translation.en: A whole new generation of players had come along.
translation.zh: ‎由此诞生了全新一代的球员

translation.en: These kids who are coming from small towns.
translation.zh: ‎这些都是来自小城镇的孩子

translation.en: So it was all very new to them, and at that time,
translation.zh:
‎周围的一切对他们来说
‎都是全新的体验

translation.en: there were no gatekeepers for access to cricketers.
translation.zh: ‎而且那时候 板球界没有准入门槛

translation.en: Indian cricket at that time was filled with these people
translation.zh: ‎当时的印度板球队有很多这样的孩子

translation.en: who were seen everywhere around the team.
translation.zh: ‎在队伍里随处可见

translation.en: Strange people are walking into the Indian dressing room
translation.zh: ‎会有奇怪的人走进印度球员更衣室

translation.en: who wanted to shower favors on them.
translation.zh: ‎用糖衣炮弹收买他们

translation.en: You know, who are these people?
translation.zh: ‎这些都是什么人？

translation.en: [Bahal] So I started talking to a lot of ex-players.
translation.zh: ‎我开始访问很多退役球员 ‎（球员-板球）

translation.en: But a lot of them didn't want to speak on record.
translation.zh: ‎可惜很多人都不同意我将对话录音

translation.en: But I always try and dig some more, try and dig some more.
translation.zh: ‎但我坚持不懈地努力挖掘真相

translation.en: And finally, I found…
translation.zh: ‎终于 我找到了…

translation.en: Manoj Prabhakar.
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉普拉哈克

translation.en: [commentator] Well bowled! That's the inswinger, the late movement in.
translation.zh:
‎好球！ ‎一记漂亮的内弧线球
‎击球手挥拍过迟

translation.en: [Ugra] Manoj Prabhakar,
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉普拉哈克

translation.en: he was a seam-bowling all-rounder for India.
translation.zh:
‎他精通缝线投球
‎是印度的全能型选手

translation.en: Great competitor and a fighting cricketer.
translation.zh:
‎他既是强大的对手
‎也是好战的板球员

translation.en: But he was always seen as a journeyman player.
translation.zh: ‎但他一直被认为是比上不足比下有余

translation.en: A lot of people called him the poor man's Kapil Dev.
translation.zh: ‎很多人说他是低配版的卡皮尔戴弗

translation.en: He's not a good athlete.
translation.zh: ‎他不是一名好运动员

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？

translation.en: He is a poor athlete, and that is a very, very big point.
translation.zh:
‎（卡皮尔戴弗
‎前印度队长） ‎他是糟糕的运动员
‎这是一个重大的缺点

translation.en: [Ugra] Prabhakar was always very fiery. He had many chips on his shoulder.
translation.zh: ‎普拉哈克的脾气很火爆 ‎总是一副怒气冲冲的样子

translation.en: [in Hindi] People are of the opinion that your temper is very unpredictable,
translation.zh: ‎人们认为你性情多变、喜怒无常

translation.en: and you have said that using profanity is in my nature?
translation.zh: ‎而你也曾说自己生性就爱说粗话？

translation.en: [in Hindi] When you play with passion,
translation.zh: ‎当你怀着满腔热情去打球

translation.en: if you are not fired up, you'll lose everything.
translation.zh: ‎如果不把情绪点燃 就可能一败涂地

translation.en: If I don't show aggression on the ground,
translation.zh:
‎像我这样的球员
‎若不在球场上表现出攻击性

translation.en: a player like me cannot perform.
translation.zh: ‎就无法发挥应有的实力

translation.en: [in English] I was scared to ask questions because I thought he'll slam the phone.
translation.zh:
‎我害怕向他提出一个问题后
‎他会怒摔电话

translation.en: [in Hindi] No one is supporting you, inside or outside of the team.
translation.zh:
‎没有人支持你
‎无论在球队内部还是外界

translation.en: What's the reason for that? Were you on good terms with them or not?
translation.zh:
‎这是什么原因？
‎你和他们的关系好吗？

translation.en: No one was allowed to raise their voice.
translation.zh: ‎队里不允许任何人大声说话

translation.en: Fear might be the big reason for it.
translation.zh: ‎很大程度上可能是出于恐惧

translation.en: Because whoever has spoken up, he's faced problems.
translation.zh:
‎因为无论谁说话大声点了
‎就会惹上麻烦

translation.en: [Bahal, in English] Manoj had just retired in '96
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉退役于1996年

translation.en: because the World Cup hadn't gone too well for him.
translation.zh: ‎因为他在世界杯出师不利

translation.en: And after that, he'd been dropped.
translation.zh: ‎在那之后 他就被球队开除了 ‎（普拉哈克离开印度队）

translation.en: So, I called and asked him, what did he know?
translation.zh: ‎于是我打电话问他是否知晓任何内幕

translation.en: What would he be willing to share?
translation.zh: ‎他愿意透露什么信息？

translation.en: Manoj had a very gruff exterior.
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉表现得很不友好

translation.en: He had a very contemptuous dig at journalists.
translation.zh: ‎他对记者极尽嘲讽和蔑视

translation.en: [in Hindi] You don't dare print the truth. You don't have the guts.
translation.zh: ‎你不敢报道真相的 ‎你没那个胆量

translation.en: [in English] So there was a lot of that attitude in Manoj.
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉就是一副这样的态度

translation.en: Manoj took a lot of convincing. I remember meeting him several times.
translation.zh:
‎说服马诺吉真是颇费了一番功夫
‎我记得去见过他好几次

translation.en: But finally, he opened a lot, he told me a lot of stories.
translation.zh:
‎但最终 他打开了心扉
‎跟我说了很多事

translation.en: Then suddenly told me that an Indian player
translation.zh: ‎然后他突然告诉我 有个印度球员

translation.en: had approached him about throwing a match.
translation.zh: ‎曾经找过他 让他刻意输球

translation.en: It was a revelation.
translation.zh: ‎这个消息石破天惊

translation.en: That was the first time a former Indian cricket player
translation.zh: ‎第一次有前印度板球选手

translation.en: came on record saying this had happened.
translation.zh: ‎在录音中明说有这种事

translation.en: There was no question we would run the story.
translation.zh: ‎毫无疑问 我们会报道这则新闻

translation.en: It was something we wanted to make a lot of noise with.
translation.zh: ‎我们想借此事引起轰动

translation.en: So I wrote this in, uh, June of 1997.
translation.zh:
‎（《瞭望》
‎印度的惊天大秘密） ‎我在1997年6月的期刊上
‎发表了这篇文章

translation.en: "India's Worst Kept Secret" which was the first time that anybody
translation.zh:
‎“印度的惊天大秘密”
‎这是人们第一次知道了

translation.en: even knew that there was match-fixing in cricket.
translation.zh: ‎板球比赛中存在造假

translation.en: And Manoj's famous allegation really caught a cat on the hot tin roof.
translation.zh:
‎马诺吉的这一指控响彻全国
‎令很多人坐立不安

translation.en: Manoj Prabhakar recently created a sensation
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉普拉哈克近期引发轰动

translation.en: by alleging that he'd been offered a large sum of money to throw,
translation.zh: ‎他声称曾有人试图用重金收买他

translation.en: which means deliberately lose,
translation.zh: ‎在一场国际板球比赛上

translation.en: an international cricket match.
translation.zh: ‎打假球 也就是故意输球

translation.zh: ‎“有人用250万卢比贿赂我

translation.en: for sabotaging the match in Pakistan's favor."
translation.zh: ‎让我故意输给巴基斯坦”

translation.en: "I was told to play below my usual standard."
translation.zh: ‎“对方让我在赛场上故意放水

translation.en: "I told him to get out of my room."
translation.zh: ‎我让他滚出我的房间”

translation.en: It was shocking, the scale of money.
translation.zh: ‎（操纵比赛的行为日益猖獗） ‎涉及的金额令人震惊 ‎（金钱力量的威胁）

translation.en: And the fact that he'd been asked by a fellow teammate to do it,
translation.zh: ‎而向他提出这一要求的是他的队友

translation.en: that was what was unsettling.
translation.zh: ‎这一事实尤为令人不安

translation.en: Sport is fundamentally meant to be unscripted.
translation.zh: ‎运动在本质上就不是预先编排的演出

translation.en: The unexpectedness of it is what makes it special.
translation.zh: ‎它的未知性 正是其独一无二的魅力

translation.en: If it's scripted,
translation.zh: ‎如果事先有剧本

translation.en: it takes away everything that sport stands for.
translation.zh: ‎就剥夺了运动的本质

translation.en: And so we just got the feeling
translation.zh: ‎所以我们有预感

translation.en: something terrible was about to break through in Indian cricket.
translation.zh: ‎印度板球界要迎来一场腥风血雨了

translation.en: But I think a lot of people didn't want to believe it.
translation.zh: ‎但我认为很多人不愿相信这件事

translation.en: [Karri] Cricket was suddenly growing, growing, growing.
translation.zh: ‎板球运动突然崛起 不断蓬勃发展

translation.en: Match-fixing.
translation.zh: ‎比赛造假

translation.en: Suddenly that shadow, match-fixing.
translation.zh: ‎这片阴影倏然而至

translation.en: It's like on a sunny day you're playing a match,
translation.zh:
‎就像你正在一个
‎阳光灿烂的日子打比赛

translation.en: suddenly clouds, thunder, rains and the match stops.
translation.zh:
‎忽然乌云密布、雷声轰隆
‎大雨倾盆 比赛中断了

translation.en: Match-fixing allegations cast a doubt.
translation.zh: ‎比赛造假的指控引发了质疑

translation.en: But I think, by and large, nobody wanted to trust Manoj Prabhakar.
translation.zh:
‎（普拉哈克
‎落于下风） ‎但我认为 大体上说
‎没有人愿意相信马诺吉普拉哈克

translation.en: [reporter] As Prabhakar refuses to name the player
translation.zh: ‎由于普拉哈克拒绝透露

translation.en: who he claims approached him to fix the match,
translation.zh: ‎找他打假赛的球员姓名

translation.en: critics have wondered if his allegations bear any substance.
translation.zh:
‎其批评者怀疑他的指控
‎是否纯属凭空捏造

translation.en: His lawyer maintains that as Prabhakar cannot prove his allegation,
translation.zh:
‎普拉哈克的律师坚称
‎由于他无法为指控提供证据

translation.en: it is up to authorities to investigate.
translation.zh: ‎其真伪应交由当局来调查

translation.en: [Bahal] There was a lot of skepticism.
translation.zh: ‎有很多人持怀疑态度

translation.en: A lot of aggression towards us.
translation.zh: ‎很多人攻击我们

translation.en: And the officials who ran the game
translation.zh: ‎主持比赛的官方人员

translation.en: had an ostrich-like attitude right from the beginning.
translation.zh: ‎从一开始就抱持着鸵鸟式的态度

translation.en: Here is a sport that you love so much.
translation.zh: ‎这是一项深受喜爱的运动

translation.en: Here is wrongdoing that you know about. But nobody wanted to do anything.
translation.zh: ‎你明知其中存在不当行为 ‎却没有人愿意采取行动

translation.en: [Ugra] Many in the cricket establishment
translation.zh: ‎板球行业的许多人

translation.en: did not want to upset this lovely little world.
translation.zh: ‎都想维持表面的风平浪静

translation.en: "Everything is so comfortable, we are so happy, money is coming."
translation.zh:
‎“现在的环境很舒适
‎我们很开心 财源滚滚”

translation.en: "This is nonsense. Let it not rock the boat."
translation.zh:
‎“那纯属胡说八道
‎别让它搅乱了局面”

translation.en: That story was looked down on and treated so shabbily.
translation.zh:
‎大家都在轻视问题
‎并未公正地看待这份指控

translation.en: It suddenly just went into a pool of nothingness.
translation.zh: ‎整件事很快石沉大海

translation.en: Manoj Prabhakar was cast into the wilderness.
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉普拉哈克被雪藏

translation.en: [Bahal] The cricket board was so unhappy
translation.zh:
‎板球委员会非常不悦
‎起诉了我们 并索赔五千万卢比

translation.en: they went and sued us for five crores.
translation.zh:
‎板球委员会非常不悦
‎起诉了我们 并索赔五千万卢比 ‎（《瞭望》杂志和普拉哈克
‎被索赔五千万）

translation.en: They wanted to put a lid on it.
translation.zh: ‎他们想控制局面 ‎（无稽的指控 不值得进一步关注）

translation.en: Cricket went on, but the story was just dying to come out.
translation.zh:
‎板球比赛仍在继续
‎但纸终究要包不住火了

translation.en: And when it actually happened,
translation.zh: ‎而当那一刻真正来临时

translation.en: the strange part about it is that it happened by accident.
translation.zh:
‎诡异的是
‎真相是在一次偶然间曝光的

translation.en: In 2000, there was a gentleman who made a complaint
translation.zh: ‎在2000年 有一位先生抱怨说…

translation.en: that he had been receiving threatening calls
translation.zh:
‎（KK保尔
‎警察局前任联合专员）

translation.en: and, uh, people were trying to extort money from him.
translation.zh:
‎…他一直接到威胁电话
‎有人想向他勒索钱财

translation.en: We started to monitor the telephones.
translation.zh: ‎我们开始监听电话

translation.en: We heard some kind of a dispute going on.
translation.zh: ‎然后听见了一场争执

translation.en: Highly abusive language.
translation.zh: ‎其中的语言极具侮辱性

translation.en: Not because of any extortion,
translation.zh: ‎他们的争吵与勒索无关

translation.en: they are discussing something about cricket.
translation.zh: ‎而是在谈论跟板球有关的事

translation.en: And then we heard, "Hi, Hansie."
translation.zh: ‎然后我们听到有人说：“你好 汉西”

translation.en: "Hi, Hansie."
translation.zh: ‎“你好 汉西”

translation.en: Who else could it be except Hansie Cronje?
translation.zh:
‎这个汉西
‎除了汉西克罗尼还能是谁？

translation.en: [commentator] And again. Well, this is magnificent stuff from Cronje.
translation.zh: ‎再一次 克罗尼今天表现突出

translation.en: [Ugra] Hansie Cronje was one of the most admired cricketers in the world.
translation.zh:
‎汉西克罗尼是世界上
‎最受喜爱的板球运动员之一

translation.en: Picked for South African captaincy very early in his career.
translation.zh:
‎在职业生涯的早期
‎他就被选为了南非队的队长

translation.en: Recording for television?
translation.zh: ‎在录电视节目？

translation.en: Can I say hello to my mother?
translation.zh: ‎我能跟我妈打个招呼吗？

translation.en: [Ugra] Everybody loved Hansie.
translation.zh: ‎人人都爱汉西

translation.en: He had the finest qualities.
translation.zh: ‎他拥有最优良的品质

translation.en: He was really a cult figure in his own country.
translation.zh: ‎他在自己的国家是如同信仰般的存在

translation.en: Absolutely a pillar of the community.
translation.zh: ‎绝对是板球界的灵魂人物

translation.en: [KK Paul] Hansie Cronje was speaking to a bookie
translation.zh: ‎汉西克罗尼在跟某个庄家说话

translation.en: discussing in detail who is to score how many runs.
translation.zh: ‎详谈要让谁拿多少跑位得分

translation.en: How much of money is to be paid?
translation.zh: ‎要付多少钱？

translation.en: Here, there was solid evidence.
translation.zh: ‎就这样 证据确凿

translation.en: Hansie Cronje was, uh, involved in match-fixing.
translation.zh: ‎汉西克罗尼参与了比赛造假

translation.en: [Paul] It emerges
translation.zh: ‎近日发现…

translation.en: that the one-day international cricket matches
translation.zh: ‎（德里警局新闻发布会） ‎…最近在印度举行的

translation.en: between India and South Africa played recently in India were fixed.
translation.zh:
‎印度对战南非的
‎板球单日国际赛存在造假

translation.en: One of the conspirators was identified
translation.zh: ‎其中一名作假者的身份已经确认

translation.en: as the South African cricket captain, Hansie Cronje.
translation.zh: ‎正是南非板球队的队长 汉西克罗尼

translation.en: [Ugra] When the news first came,
translation.zh: ‎新闻刚爆出来的时候

translation.en: your first chance to say, "No, it's not true."
translation.zh: ‎你第一时间会说：“不 这不是真的”

translation.en: Of all the people in the entire cricket world,
translation.zh: ‎纵观整个板球界

translation.en: you would not pick on that name.
translation.zh: ‎那个名字都不该出现在这种新闻里

translation.en: I've never received any sum of money for any match that I've been involved in.
translation.zh:
‎我从未利用参与过的比赛
‎收受任何钱财

translation.en: I've never approached any of the players.
translation.zh: ‎也从未唆使球员造假

translation.en: First response from South Africa was absolute denial.
translation.zh: ‎南非方面的第一反应是全盘否认

translation.en: The allegations are outrageous.
translation.zh: ‎荒谬的指控

translation.en: It's libelous, it's defamatory.
translation.zh: ‎这是诽谤 是恶意中伤

translation.en: [Paul] Nobody would believe it.
translation.zh: ‎没有人愿意相信

translation.en: So, whatever evidence we had, we had to make it public.
translation.zh:
‎所以 无论掌握了什么证据
‎我们都必须公开

translation.en: And then Hansie Cronje felt the pressure
translation.zh: ‎然后汉西克罗尼在压力之下

translation.en: and ultimately, then he confessed.
translation.zh: ‎最终坦白承认了

translation.en: [reporter 1] The cricket world has been stunned
translation.zh: ‎汉西克罗尼承认打假球

translation.en: after a shocking admission by Hansie Cronje.
translation.zh: ‎板球界大为震惊 ‎（克罗尼见钱眼开）

translation.en: [reporter 2] Complete disbelief. Impossible to say what will happen next.
translation.zh:
‎（克罗尼坦承恶劣行迹） ‎简直难以置信
‎无法预料接下来会如何

translation.en: [Bahal] When the Hansie incident broke,
translation.zh: ‎汉西事件爆发后

translation.en: there was a sense of, "Finally nobody could deny it anymore"
translation.zh:
‎我有一种感觉
‎“终于没人能再否认这个事实了”

translation.en: that there was match-fixing in cricket.
translation.zh: ‎在板球比赛里存在造假

translation.en: The news environment became so hot.
translation.zh: ‎新闻环境变得异常火热

translation.en: Could Indian players be involved?
translation.zh: ‎印度球员也参与造假了吗？

translation.en: [Dev] This is have to be clean-up job.
translation.zh: ‎必须严格肃清此类风气

translation.en: If anybody in the world have done something this bad,
translation.zh: ‎世界上无论任何人有如此恶行

translation.en: should be hanged.
translation.zh: ‎都该被绞死

translation.en: [Bahal] And I was getting very ambitious
translation.zh: ‎我开始雄心勃勃地

translation.en: about revisiting the match-fixing story, so to speak.
translation.zh: ‎想要重新挖掘打假赛的新闻

translation.en: So I started talking to other reporters and that's when Minty came onboard.
translation.zh:
‎于是我开始找其他记者谈
‎就在那时 闵提加入了我

translation.en: [Tejpal] I'm insanely curious. I've always been so.
translation.zh: ‎我非常好奇 我一向如此

translation.en: I need to know the truth, what I really love.
translation.zh: ‎我需要知道真相 我热爱真相

translation.en: This was investigative journalism.
translation.zh: ‎这就是调查性报道

translation.en: Hardcore investigative journalism because you were chasing down a story.
translation.zh:
‎（“喧嚣”新闻网联合创办人） ‎严谨的调查报道
‎就是要追寻事件的真相

translation.en: So, in year 2000, Aniruddha Bahal, fabulous writer and journalist and myself,
translation.zh:
‎所以 在2000年
‎我和杰出作家兼记者阿尼鲁巴亥尔

translation.en: started this company called Tehelka.
translation.zh: ‎创办了名为“喧嚣”的公司

translation.en: It's an Urdu word which means "sensation, impact, bloody hell, explosion."
translation.zh:
‎这是乌尔都语里的一个词 含义是
‎“轰动性、巨大影响、惊叹、爆炸性”

translation.en: And our slug line was "News, Views, All the juice." My line.
translation.zh:
‎我们的标语是
‎“新闻、见解 精华荟萃” 我想出来的

translation.en: [Bahal] We had the ambition for cricket match-fixing
translation.zh: ‎我们踌躇满志 要把板球比赛造假

translation.en: to be the first story that we did in Tehelka.
translation.zh: ‎作为发布在“喧嚣”网的头一条新闻

translation.en: But the cast of characters who were part of it
translation.zh: ‎但我们的采访目标

translation.en: were still not willing to talk about it.
translation.zh: ‎仍然不愿谈论此事

translation.en: Everybody went, "Mum's the word."
translation.zh: ‎所有人都三缄其口

translation.en: [Tejpal] I think the only way to get certain truths out
translation.zh: ‎我认为获取真相的唯一方法

translation.en: is cloak and dagger.
translation.zh: ‎就是暗中取证

translation.en: So we came up with this plan to target and trap
translation.zh: ‎我们计划使用隐藏摄像头对目标球员

translation.en: the cricketers and administrators
translation.zh: ‎和管理人员下套

translation.en: using spy cam equipment and get the truth out.
translation.zh: ‎从而获取真相

translation.en: [Bahal] This would be the first time hidden cameras
translation.zh: ‎这是隐藏摄像头

translation.en: would have been used on a big scale in India.
translation.zh: ‎首次在印度被大规模使用

translation.en: So, I had to go to London
translation.zh: ‎（洛林电子 间谍用品店） ‎所以我得去伦敦采购尖端科技产品

translation.en: to get the most cutting-edge tech available.
translation.zh: ‎所以我得去伦敦采购尖端科技产品

translation.en: So for example, we can put it in these glasses.
translation.zh: ‎比如说 我们可以把它放到眼镜里

translation.en: [Tejpal] Camera fitted in glasses, watches, pens…
translation.zh:
‎摄像头可以藏在
‎眼镜、手表、钢笔里…

translation.en: Stuff never used in India before ever. We had never seen it.
translation.zh:
‎这种东西在印度从来没人用过
‎我们前所未见

translation.en: [Bahal] There was this briefcase which had this whole big recording device.
translation.zh:
‎像这样一个公文包里
‎装着一整套录音设备

translation.en: So now if we had good quality spy cam…
translation.zh: ‎配备了优质的间谍摄像头之后…

translation.en: we needed access to those players.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要接近那些球员

translation.en: So, Manoj was an obvious choice of an insider.
translation.zh:
‎马诺吉是圈内人
‎显然是理想的合作伙伴

translation.en: Manoj realized, last three years, nobody has found anything out.
translation.zh:
‎马诺吉意识到
‎在过去三年里 没有人有任何新发现

translation.en: Nothing came out. Nothing happened.
translation.zh: ‎没有新闻 风平浪静

translation.en: When I informed those guys, why didn't they take the action?
translation.zh:
‎当我把真相告知时
‎那些人为什么没采取行动？

translation.en: For him to see cheating in a sport that he loved.
translation.zh: ‎让他看到自己热爱的赛事有人作弊

translation.en: That's like seeing your wife being unfaithful in front of your eyes.
translation.zh: ‎就好像你看着妻子在你眼前偷情

translation.en: This is not my job to solve the problem.
translation.zh: ‎解决问题不是我的工作

translation.en: This is their job.
translation.zh: ‎是他们的工作

translation.en: He said, "How can I prove my innocence? How can I prove this incident happened?"
translation.zh:
‎他说：“我要怎么证明自己的清白？
‎怎么证明确有其事？”

translation.en: Nobody was willing to stand up for him.
translation.zh: ‎没人愿意支持他

translation.en: [Bahal] One of the ways I could convince him was with the tech.
translation.zh:
‎我能想到的办法
‎就是用这些高科技装备去说服他

translation.en: So, I went back to Manoj,
translation.zh: ‎所以我再次找到马诺吉

translation.en: I told him, if you go undercover,
translation.zh: ‎跟他说 你如果去做卧底

translation.en: perhaps more will come out and validate your claims.
translation.zh: ‎也许能挖出更多料来 证实你的指控

translation.en: Then while we were talking about it, I filmed it and he didn't know about it.
translation.zh:
‎我把交谈过程录了下来
‎而他毫无察觉

translation.en: Manoj was stunned. Okay? He's saying, "What the hell?"
translation.zh:
‎马诺吉大吃一惊 知道吗？
‎他说：“什么情况？”

translation.en: His eyes lit up. "Really? I can do this?"
translation.zh:
‎他的眼睛亮了起来
‎“真的吗？我可以这么做？”

translation.en: Manoj realized that the hidden camera
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉意识到隐藏摄像头

translation.en: was the only way to put the cat on the hot tin roof again.
translation.zh: ‎是让旧事重回焦点的唯一途径

translation.en: [Tejpal] Over a period of six weeks,
translation.zh: ‎在六周的时间里

translation.en: Manoj Prabhakar and Aniruddha Bahal traversed the country
translation.zh:
‎马诺吉普拉哈克和阿尼鲁巴亥尔
‎跑遍了全国各地

translation.en: to sting various cricketers and administrators
translation.zh: ‎去套各种板球选手和管理人员的话

translation.en: who were not match-fixing themselves,
translation.zh: ‎那些人自己没有参与造假

translation.en: but they knew about it, knew it was happening.
translation.zh: ‎但知晓内情 知道有这回事

translation.en: Aniruddha Bahal is a fearless investigative journalist.
translation.zh:
‎阿尼鲁巴亥尔
‎是一名大无畏的调查记者

translation.en: But Manoj Prabhakar
translation.zh: ‎但马诺吉普拉哈克

translation.en: was going out and stinging his friends and colleagues.
translation.zh: ‎要面对的是他的朋友和同僚

translation.en: Guys he had played with for so many years.
translation.zh: ‎他和那些人并肩作战了很多年

translation.en: You need balls to run with this kind of thing.
translation.zh: ‎做这种事是需要勇气的

translation.en: [Bahal] It was the first time I went undercover.
translation.zh: ‎那是我第一次当卧底

translation.en: The fear that you could be caught out
translation.zh: ‎我心里一直在打鼓

translation.en: is always there.
translation.zh: ‎害怕被识破

translation.en: See, you're not getting opportunities for controlling angles.
translation.zh: ‎你没有机会调控摄像角度

translation.en: Because that would look very suspicious.
translation.zh: ‎因为那样的举动会很可疑

translation.en: And you're perhaps getting just the legs of the chair, so to speak,
translation.zh: ‎你有可能只会录到椅子腿

translation.en: or the heads are cut.
translation.zh: ‎或者录不全对方的脸

translation.en: You had to also be worried about…
translation.zh: ‎你还得担心…

translation.en: Has the battery run out? Or has the tape run out?
translation.zh:
‎电池会不会没电了？
‎录像带会不会走到头了？

translation.en: You would have to take a bathroom break to change the tape or battery.
translation.zh:
‎你得在中途假借上厕所的名义
‎更换录像带或者电池

translation.en: And going in the loo with a briefcase looks suspicious.
translation.zh: ‎而提着公文包去上厕所又显得很可疑

translation.en: "Why is he…" [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎“他为什么…“

translation.en: We would bring in the tapes in, Manoj Prabhakar and me, and then…
translation.zh:
‎我和马诺吉普拉哈克
‎负责提供录像 然后…

translation.en: Minty's job was to produce the whole thing.
translation.zh: ‎闵提负责制作视频

translation.en: [Tejpal] The first day when the material came back and we started looking at the footage,
translation.zh:
‎拿回资料的第一天
‎我们开始查看录像

translation.en: I realized it's going to be a fucking nightmare to do.
translation.zh:
‎那时我就意识到

translation.zh: ‎嘈杂的音频 奇怪的拍摄角度

translation.en: You try and transcribe an interview where you can't see lip movement, girl.
translation.zh:
‎你去抄录一段
‎看不见人物说话口型的访谈录音试试

translation.en: It is maddening.
translation.zh: ‎我简直要抓狂了

translation.en: But even though none of them were involved in any wrongdoing themselves,
translation.zh: ‎可即便那些人自身没有任何不当行为

translation.en: it very quickly became clear, we had an explosive story on our hands.
translation.zh:
‎我们也很快意识到
‎手里握着的是多么劲爆的新闻

translation.en: [Tejpal] These people were saying what they suspected was happening.
translation.zh: ‎这些人在聊自己的怀疑

translation.en: [Tejpal] We were watching the top cricketers and administrators
translation.zh:
‎我们眼看着
‎顶级的板球选手和管理人员

translation.en: talking about match-fixing in such casual manner.
translation.zh: ‎漫不经心地谈论比赛造假的事

translation.en: [Bahal, in English] The Hansie incident created furore.
translation.zh: ‎汉西事件引起了轩然大波

translation.en: Then the news environment became so hot…
translation.zh: ‎各大媒体争相报道…

translation.en: We had this, sort of, big fear in us.
translation.zh: ‎我们很害怕

translation.en: If we didn't break the story, some leak will happen somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎若不赶快发布新闻
‎会有消息从别处流出来

translation.en: There was a lot of time pressure on me.
translation.zh: ‎我感到时间紧迫 压力很大

translation.en: But Minty was this production guy
translation.zh: ‎但闵提是那种凡事

translation.en: who wanted to take things one step at a time.
translation.zh: ‎喜欢一步一步来的制作人

translation.en: We had shot people on the sly.
translation.zh: ‎我们偷拍了别人

translation.en: We had stung them.
translation.zh: ‎我们套了他们的话

translation.en: I could not have one word going wrong.
translation.zh: ‎我得保证不能有一个字出错

translation.en: Manoj, at one point, called me every four, five days…
translation.zh:
‎有段时间
‎马诺吉每隔四五天就会给我打电话

translation.en: [in Hindi] "Is the edit ready? Is the film done?"
translation.zh:
‎“准备好了吗？
‎剪辑好没？影片完成了吗？”

translation.en: [in English] Fuck you! This is not bloody, some bloody Maggi noodles happening, man.
translation.zh:
‎去你的！
‎我这又不是在泡方便面 老兄

translation.en: This is serious stuff,
translation.zh: ‎这是很严肃的事情

translation.en: and I'm a slightly serious and scary motherfucker when I need to be.
translation.zh:
‎而我在必要时
‎就是会有点严肃 有点吓人

translation.en: [reporter] An explosive film about corruption in Indian cricket
translation.zh: ‎据称 今天将有一部关于印度板球的

translation.en: that could throw the game into chaos is said to be released today.
translation.zh:
‎爆炸性影片发布
‎或将引发板球界的混乱

translation.en: Hall was filled with some 40 cameras and 100 journalists.
translation.zh:
‎发布会大厅挤满了人
‎有40台摄像机和100名记者

translation.en: Packed to the rafters.
translation.zh: ‎满屋子都是人

translation.en: International media, politicians, lawyers…
translation.zh: ‎国际媒体、政客、律师…

translation.en: The word had spread.
translation.zh: ‎消息不胫而走

translation.en: [Bahal] The cast of characters was the who's who in cricket.
translation.zh: ‎影片的主角都是板球界的知名人士

translation.en: There was obviously enormous interest.
translation.zh: ‎这显然引起了人们强烈的兴趣

translation.en: [Tejpal] We had sent a copy of the tape to the president.
translation.zh:
‎我们事先把录像带
‎拷贝了一份发给总统

translation.en: Because we were very worried that our tapes might get confiscated,
translation.zh: ‎因为我们担心带子会被收缴

translation.en: and we didn't know if action would be taken.
translation.zh: ‎或者会有人出手阻挠

translation.en: And then, at two o'clock,
translation.zh: ‎然后 在2点整

translation.en: the final Fallen Heroes documentary was eventually shown to the press.
translation.zh:
‎《堕落英雄》纪录片的最终版
‎终于呈现在了媒体面前

translation.en: When the tapes first emerged, everyone was aghast.
translation.zh: ‎录像画面一出现 全场一片哗然

translation.en: I think it broke a lot of people's hearts to see what was happening.
translation.zh: ‎我想这件事应该令很多人心碎吧

translation.en: I was horrified to hear officials say cricket's finished.
translation.zh: ‎我很震惊地听见有官员说板球完了

translation.en: Everyone's going to leave it.
translation.zh: ‎所有人都会弃之如敝履

translation.en: [Tejpal, in English] Our press conference was stunned.
translation.zh: ‎现场的记者被惊得目瞪口呆

translation.en: It revealed quite clearly that match-fixing was happening in India,
translation.zh: ‎影片清楚地表明在印度有人操纵比赛

translation.en: and the cricketers and administrators, they knew it was happening.
translation.zh: ‎而板球选手和管理者都心知肚明

translation.en: [in English] That creates… boom!
translation.zh: ‎那部纪录片…造成了轰动！

translation.en: [Ugra] The cricket fans were deeply shattered.
translation.zh: ‎球迷们被伤透了心

translation.en: You did think that cricket was having a credibility crisis.
translation.zh: ‎板球界似乎爆发了信任危机

translation.en: [reporter] Unsurprisingly, some of the team's key figures
translation.zh: ‎毫不意外 球队的一些关键人物

translation.en: were trying to avoid the cameras.
translation.zh: ‎都试图躲避摄影机

translation.en: I think, uh… Nobody told me anything.
translation.zh: ‎我认为…我完全被蒙在鼓里

translation.en: I'm not aware of those things. That's all I have to say.
translation.zh: ‎我只能说 我不知道有这种事

translation.en: [reporter] Meanwhile, the board secretary is questioning Prabhakar's credibility.
translation.zh: ‎与此同时 板球委员会的秘书 ‎公然质疑普拉哈克的可信度

translation.en: [Jaywant Lele] Anything can be doctored, no?
translation.zh:
‎一切都可以被伪造 ‎（板球委员会前秘书
‎杰旺雷雷的声音）

translation.en: I don't want to say anything. Let him do what he wants.
translation.zh:
‎（板球委员会前秘书
‎杰旺雷雷的声音） ‎我什么都不想说 他想怎样就怎样吧

translation.en: He is proving his own mettle, what sort of person he is.
translation.zh:
‎他只是在证明自己有种
‎他就是那种人

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: ‎非常感谢

translation.en: [Tejpal] Manoj was very, very happy that we stuck with him.
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉很高兴我们坚持跟他合作

translation.en: We finished the story.
translation.zh: ‎我们完成了新闻

translation.en: And finally, he told us the biggest bit of explosive news,
translation.zh: ‎终于 他把最大的猛料爆给了我们

translation.en: the name of the cricketer who offered him the bribe.
translation.zh: ‎那个企图贿赂他的板球选手的姓名

translation.en: I first met Manoj in mid '97,
translation.zh: ‎我第一次见马诺吉 是在1997年中旬

translation.en: when I went to him to have a chat about match-fixing.
translation.zh: ‎我去找他聊比赛造假的内幕

translation.en: Even in those early days, he would drop sufficient hints
translation.zh:
‎甚至早在那个时候
‎他就给出过充分的提示

translation.en: that the name he was referring to was Kapil Dev.
translation.zh: ‎当时想收买他的球员是卡皮尔戴弗

translation.en: [commentator] That's out. Yes.
translation.zh: ‎出局 是的

translation.en: Growing up, Kapil Dev was our hero.
translation.zh:
‎从小到大
‎卡皮尔戴弗一直是国民英雄

translation.en: In 1983, when India won the World Cup, he became a superstar across India.
translation.zh:
‎1983年 印度在世界杯夺冠
‎他成了享誉全国的超级明星 ‎（卡皮尔带我们走进世界杯历史
‎英国 罗德板球场）

translation.en: [reporter 1] Prabhakar has finally come forward to name Kapil Dev.
translation.zh:
‎普拉哈克最终道出了
‎卡皮尔戴弗的名字

translation.en: [Ugra] So when Manoj Prabhakar took Kapil Dev's name,
translation.zh: ‎当马诺吉普拉哈克说出这个名字时

translation.en: it's almost like challenging a God of cricket.
translation.zh: ‎几乎就是在跟板球界的神叫板

translation.en: Oh, who's Prabhakar? Ready to face? Does he have a guts to face me?
translation.zh:
‎普拉哈克是哪根葱？
‎要来当面对质吗？他有胆面对我吗？

translation.en: [in Hindi] What does Prabhakar think of himself?
translation.zh: ‎普拉哈克以为自己是谁？

translation.en: What is he even worth? What cricket has he played?
translation.zh: ‎他有什么价值？他打过什么比赛？

translation.en: What good has he done?
translation.zh: ‎他做过什么贡献？

translation.en: I have no regrets.
translation.zh: ‎我不后悔

translation.en: But my aim has always been to clean cricket,
translation.zh: ‎我的目标一直是肃清板球界

translation.en: to clean the system.
translation.zh: ‎清理这个系统

translation.en: Today, by doing this,
translation.zh: ‎今天 我做的这一切

translation.en: I have not made any mistakes.
translation.zh: ‎没有丝毫过错

translation.en: [reporter 1, in English] After Prabhakar's allegation,
translation.zh: ‎在普拉哈克发出令人震惊的指控后

translation.en: cricket fans will be wondering if this is a desperate ploy
translation.zh: ‎球迷们会怀疑这究竟是他狗急跳墙

translation.en: or if there is worse to come yet.
translation.zh: ‎还是会有更糟糕的新闻在后头

translation.en: [Ugra] In the 2000s, when all these revelations came out,
translation.zh: ‎在2000年 当这些内幕被揭发之后

translation.en: you cared about how terrible it was, you wanted it to be solved and sorted.
translation.zh:
‎你会关心情况有多糟糕
‎会希望问题得到妥善处理和解决

translation.en: [reporter 2] Today in parliament, several MPs
translation.zh: ‎今天在国会 有几位议员

translation.en: demanded a probe into the controversial matter.
translation.zh: ‎要求调查这起备受争议的事件

translation.en: It became sort of a hot-button issue for politicians to tap into.
translation.zh: ‎它成了有待政客们挖掘的敏感话题

translation.en: [in Hindi] We have heard the views of the nation,
translation.zh:
‎我们听取了全国人民… ‎（苏克戴夫辛丁萨
‎体育部长）

translation.en: parliament, and our athletes,
translation.zh: ‎…国会议员和本国运动员的意见

translation.en: and the majority view is that a CBI enquiry is the only way forward.
translation.zh:
‎大多数人认为
‎让中央调查局展开调查是唯一的对策

translation.en: CENTRAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
translation.zh: ‎（中央调查局）

translation.en: [reporter 3, in English] After much speculation,
translation.zh: ‎经过一番推测后

translation.en: the sports minister has announced a CBI inquiry
translation.zh:
‎体育部长宣布
‎将由中央调查局对是否存在

translation.en: into the match-fixing controversy.
translation.zh: ‎比赛造假一事进行调查

translation.en: [Karri] The CBI is the premier investigating agency of India.
translation.zh: ‎中央调查局是印度的首要调查机构

translation.en: They have the best manpower resources.
translation.zh: ‎具备最强大的人力资源

translation.en: It's a kind of final hope in India.
translation.zh: ‎它算是印度最后的希望

translation.en: [reporter 4] With some of the country's biggest cricket stars potentially involved,
translation.zh:
‎由于一些在印度
‎最有名望的板球明星涉嫌参与造假

translation.en: the CBI is expected to proceed with caution.
translation.zh: ‎中央调查局需要谨慎行事

translation.en: [Sawani] I was in my office and I was called by the chief of CBI.
translation.zh:
‎中央调查局局长把我叫了过来
‎他们想要最缜密的调查

translation.en: They wanted the best investigation.
translation.zh:
‎中央调查局局长把我叫了过来
‎他们想要最缜密的调查 ‎（拉维萨瓦尼
‎调查局前任联席局长 特别犯罪科）

translation.en: "Would your unit be able to handle this?"
translation.zh: ‎“你的部门能应付吗？”

translation.en: I was never a crazy fan for cricket.
translation.zh: ‎我从来不是什么板球迷

translation.en: I was more of an enthusiast about boxing and horse riding.
translation.zh: ‎我更喜欢拳击和骑马

translation.en: But the kind of allegations that were being made at that point of time,
translation.zh: ‎但在当时 那样的指控

translation.en: they were absolutely unbelievable.
translation.zh: ‎真的令人难以置信

translation.en: How could we think anybody throwing a game which he was playing for the nation?
translation.zh:
‎我们怎么能想到会有人
‎代表国家参赛 却故意输球呢？

translation.en: So I just grabbed at it. I said, "Why not, sir?"
translation.zh:
‎所以我当即接下了任务
‎我说：“好的 先生

translation.en: "It would be an honor. Absolutely."
translation.zh: ‎这是我的荣幸 绝对是”

translation.en: The CBI investigation was a massive story. It made for absolutely compelling viewing.
translation.zh: ‎中央调查局的调查是一桩大新闻 ‎能带来绝高的收视率

translation.en: Here at the CBI headquarters, there's almost a veil of secrecy.
translation.zh:
‎这里是中央调查局总部
‎如今它笼罩着一层神秘的面纱

translation.en: Cricketers and alleged bookies will be interrogated in the coming weeks.
translation.zh:
‎板球选手和涉案庄家
‎将在接下来的几周里接受审问

translation.en: [Sawani] The eyes of the entire nation were fixed on the CBI.
translation.zh: ‎举国上下的目光都聚焦在中央调查局

translation.en: What happened? What is the truth?
translation.zh: ‎发生了什么事？真相究竟如何？

translation.en: As a muckraker, you have to get into areas which you think are going to be tough.
translation.zh:
‎一名揭露丑闻的记者
‎必须深入虎穴进行调查 ‎（穆拉利克里什南
‎《瞭望》杂志 调查记者）

translation.en: No-go areas.
translation.zh: ‎一些所谓的禁区

translation.en: Even though this is a very high-profile case
translation.zh: ‎虽然此案备受瞩目

translation.en: where reputations are going to be made or marred,
translation.zh:
‎它既能让人功成名就
‎也能叫人身败名裂

translation.en: I managed to sort of, uh, worm my way
translation.zh: ‎但我逐渐赢得了那次调查中

translation.en: with some of the key people involved in this investigation.
translation.zh: ‎一部分关键人物的信任

translation.en: The CBI's expertise has largely been uncovering corruption
translation.zh:
‎中央调查局的专员
‎以往调查的大多是各种其他领域

translation.en: in various other facets, but not in cricket.
translation.zh: ‎存在的腐败现象 但从未涉及板球界

translation.en: I don't think they really had an inkling on how big the case would turn out to be.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得他们当时并不明白
‎这个案子的性质有多严重

translation.en: [Sawani] Frankly, when we started this investigation,
translation.zh: ‎坦白说 我们刚开始调查时

translation.en: there was only this one allegation made by Manoj Prabhakar
translation.zh: ‎只有马诺吉普拉哈克一人出面指控了

translation.en: that Kapil Dev offered him 25 lakh rupees.
translation.zh:
‎卡皮尔戴弗
‎企图以250万卢比贿赂他打假球

translation.en: People did want to know,
translation.zh: ‎人们都想知道

translation.en: is there any truth in what Manoj Prabhakar is saying?
translation.zh: ‎马诺吉普拉哈克所言究竟是真是假？

translation.en: [Bahal] We knew the CBI would be interested in what we had done.
translation.zh:
‎我们知道中央调查局
‎一定会对我们做过的调查感兴趣

translation.en: The next thing we knew, the CBI wanted all our material.
translation.zh:
‎很快 他们就征用了
‎我们的所有录像资料

translation.en: [reporter] Prabhakar seems sure that after watching his tape,
translation.zh: ‎普拉哈克似乎很确信中央调查局

translation.en: the CBI will be able to take decisive action
translation.zh: ‎在看过他的录像之后 一定会果断地

translation.en: against some Indian players.
translation.zh: ‎对某些印度球员采取行动

translation.en: [in Hindi] If you speak with them, you will understand,
translation.zh: ‎只要去采访他们 你就会明白

translation.en: I have proven who it was that offered me the bribe.
translation.zh: ‎我已经证明了是谁企图贿赂我

translation.en: [man on laptop, in English] Azhar was officially… Yes!
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁已经正式… ‎对！

translation.en: [Sawani] We did glean all the information that was there in those tapes.
translation.zh: ‎我们收集了那些录像带里的全部信息

translation.en: [Sawani] There were a lot of allegations flying around,
translation.zh: ‎各种指控满天飞

translation.en: but I wouldn't say
translation.zh: ‎但我要说的是

translation.en: that there was any major evidence which could nail somebody without doubt.
translation.zh:
‎没有任何确凿的证据
‎表明具体某个人参与了造假

translation.en: [Krishnan] The problem with sting operations using hidden cameras is,
translation.zh:
‎用隐藏摄像头
‎采取钓鱼行动的一大弊端就是

translation.en: it was mostly anecdotal evidence.
translation.zh: ‎它获取的大多都是轶事证据

translation.en: There was no empirical material evidence.
translation.zh: ‎而缺乏实质性的经验证据

translation.en: But RN Sawani was a very smart officer.
translation.zh:
‎但拉维萨瓦尼
‎是一位非常聪明的调查官

translation.en: He was keen on looking at the bigger picture.
translation.zh: ‎他喜欢着眼于大局

translation.en: [Sawani] Tehelka tapes did expose the underbelly
translation.zh: ‎喧嚣新闻的录像确实揭露了

translation.en: in the world of cricket
translation.zh: ‎板球界的阴暗面

translation.en: and showed the role of the illegal bookies.
translation.zh: ‎显示了非法庄家扮演的角色

translation.en: [in English] The CBI had to find out whether players were tainted
translation.zh:
‎中央调查局
‎必须核查是否有球员被收买

translation.en: and what kind of nexus they did enjoy with bookmakers.
translation.zh: ‎以及他们跟赌坊庄家有何关联

translation.en: [Sawani] My team started to gather every bookie
translation.zh: ‎我的团队开始搜集被国内警局

translation.en: who had ever been booked by any police station in the country.
translation.zh: ‎记录在案的所有庄家的信息

translation.en: This spread to Mumbai, Delhi, Gujarat region, Rajasthan.
translation.zh:
‎这些庄家遍布孟买
‎德里、古吉拉特邦和拉贾斯坦邦

translation.en: Within the first week,
translation.zh: ‎在第一周

translation.en: we had 209 top bookies of the country in our list.
translation.zh: ‎我们就罗列了209家国内的顶级赌坊

translation.en: [bookie on tape, in Hindi] When the CBI agent got involved,
translation.zh: ‎（匿名庄家的声音） ‎中央调查局特工的介入

translation.en: it created a very fearful atmosphere for us.
translation.zh: ‎给我们营造了一个可怕的氛围

translation.en: It was such a big scandal.
translation.zh: ‎这是一桩大丑闻

translation.en: We were scared that any of us
translation.zh: ‎我们害怕会有自己人

translation.en: could be dragged in.
translation.zh: ‎被带过去问话

translation.en: But the aim of the CBI was not to catch bookies.
translation.zh:
‎但中央调查局的目标
‎不是逮捕赌坊庄家

translation.en: Their main motive was to get deeper into this case.
translation.zh: ‎他们的主要目的是深入调查案情

translation.en: Get knowledge and information.
translation.zh: ‎获取知识和信息

translation.en: [man on radio, in Hindi] 83, 58-59…
[in English] We found that there was a system called a "dabba system."
translation.zh: ‎我们发现了一个叫做“达巴”的系统

translation.en: [man on radio] 85-8…
[Sawani] It would broadcast the odd rates to all the bookies at the same time.
translation.zh: ‎它会同时向所有庄家播报赔率

translation.en: [man on radio, in Hindi] 85-8, 58-59…
[bookie on tape] A man is constantly giving rates, or Bhao.
translation.zh:
‎会有一个男人持续给出赔率
‎或者查询方式

translation.en: Who that man is, no one knows. It's just a voice.
translation.zh:
‎没有人知道那个男人是谁
‎只听过他的声音

translation.en: He will say the amount and name of the team
translation.zh: ‎他会报出数字和球队的名称

translation.en: and we make a note of it.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们记下来

translation.en: [man on radio] 80-83, 62-63…
[bookie on tape] All over India, and the world, there is only one rate going, at one time.
translation.zh:
‎在全印度 乃至全世界
‎同一时间只会有一个赔率

translation.en: We don't want to know who gives these rates.
translation.zh: ‎我们不想知道它是谁给出来的

translation.en: [Ugra, in English] Every bookie was dealing with somebody at a higher level.
translation.zh:
‎（庄家-赌徒） ‎每一个庄家
‎都会跟某个更高级别的人打交道

translation.en: And it is almost like a ladder at which it goes to the person right at the top
translation.zh:
‎这层层关系就好像一张梯子
‎而处于最顶端的

translation.en: who makes all the big money there is.
translation.zh: ‎就是那个赚大钱的人

translation.en: [Sawani] As we dug further into this investigation,
translation.zh: ‎随着调查的深入

translation.en: it became bigger and bigger and bigger.
translation.zh: ‎案子的情节变得越来越严重

translation.en: We found out the bookies were being controlled by criminals…
translation.zh: ‎我们发现那些庄家都听命于…

translation.en: in Dubai and Sharjah.
translation.zh: ‎迪拜和沙迦的罪犯

translation.en: Sharjah was this Las Vegas of the Middle East.
translation.zh: ‎沙迦就是中东的拉斯维加斯

translation.en: Lot of Indians dream they will go to Sharjah to watch a match.
translation.zh: ‎很多印度人都梦想着去沙迦看比赛

translation.en: Television stars,
translation.zh: ‎电视明星

translation.en: movie stars,
translation.zh: ‎电影明星

translation.en: their sunglasses and fashion and all that.
translation.zh: ‎他们佩戴着墨镜 新潮时尚

translation.en: And amidst them all would be sitting a man,
translation.zh: ‎在这些人之中 坐着一个男人

translation.en: India's most wanted criminal, Dawood Ibrahim.
translation.zh: ‎印度的头号通缉犯 达乌德易卜拉欣

translation.en: He was known for controlling drugs.
translation.zh: ‎他是有名的大毒枭

translation.en: He would kill anybody who wouldn't give him regular money.
translation.zh: ‎会无情地杀害不能给他固定收益的人

translation.en: He would be sitting there talking on a telephone
translation.zh: ‎他坐在那里打电话

translation.en: and obviously giving orders on what should happen in the game.
translation.zh: ‎显然是在对赛况发号施令

translation.en: And therefore, those who were in cricket in those days
translation.zh: ‎因此 当时在板球业内的人士

translation.en: had to suffer a lot of underworld pressure.
translation.zh: ‎都不得不承受来自黑社会的压力

translation.en: [Sawani] You must understand,
translation.zh: ‎你必须明白

translation.en: this bookie world is a dangerous world.
translation.zh: ‎赌博的世界危机重重

translation.en: The crime syndicates are unforgiving to any who break the line.
translation.zh: ‎犯罪集团不会放过任何越界的人

translation.en: So nobody wanted to come out and say anything
translation.zh: ‎所以没有人愿意站出来说

translation.en: about what's wrong with the game.
translation.zh: ‎板球比赛存在什么问题

translation.en: But then a very, very important breakthrough came from South Africa.
translation.zh:
‎但后来 我们的调查
‎在南非取得了重大突破

translation.en: [reporter 1] Cronje is to be cross-examined at the King Commission
translation.zh: ‎比赛造假丑闻最新进展 汉西克罗尼

translation.en: as part of the latest development in the match-fixing scandal.
translation.zh: ‎将在国王委员会接受交叉盘问

translation.en: [reporter 2] The aim of the commission is to get to the truth of the allegations.
translation.zh: ‎委员会的宗旨 ‎是查明假赛指控的真相

translation.en: At the same time as the CBI investigation, South Africans set up the King Commission
translation.zh: ‎在印度中央调查局行动的同时 ‎南非也成立了国王委员会

translation.en: to look into Hansie Cronje's confession.
translation.zh: ‎调查汉西克罗尼的供状

translation.en: I failed in my moral and professional duties.
translation.zh: ‎我的行为有悖道德、有违职业操守

translation.en: I was not honest and I apologize unreservedly.
translation.zh: ‎我衷心为自己不诚实的行为道歉

translation.en: His whole persona had changed.
translation.zh: ‎他整个人的形象都颠覆了

translation.en: He literally shrunk down in his chair.
translation.zh: ‎他蜷缩在椅子里 显得格外弱小

translation.en: But the most dramatic thing in the King Commission
translation.zh:
‎但在国王委员会
‎发生的最戏剧性的一幕

translation.en: was when Hansie Cronje revealed
translation.zh: ‎就是汉西克罗尼

translation.en: the Indian connection with a global network of illegal betting.
translation.zh:
‎揭发了印度
‎与国际非法赌博网络之间的关联 ‎（以三万美元收买球员故意输球）

translation.en: Cronje said that he had been introduced to this bookie, M.K Gupta.
translation.zh:
‎克罗尼说他经人介绍
‎认识了一个叫MK古普塔的庄家 ‎（MK古普塔）

translation.en: [Cronje] He asked me to speak to the other players
translation.zh: ‎他让我去跟其他球员交涉

translation.en: and gave me approximately 30,000 US dollars in cash to do so.
translation.zh: ‎给了我大约三万美元现金去走动

translation.en: That was a big revelation.
translation.zh: ‎这一披露意义重大

translation.en: We realized he would be a gold mine for us.
translation.zh: ‎我们意识到可以从他那里入手调查

translation.en: But M.K was not in our list of bookies.
translation.zh: ‎但MK不在我们列出的庄家名单里 ‎（穆凯什古普塔）

translation.en: So, we started a big hunt.
translation.zh: ‎所以 我们展开了大搜捕

translation.en: [reporter] The CBI hunt for bookie M.K Gupta
translation.zh:
‎中央调查局
‎于今日在德里的南部商业区

translation.en: started today in Delhi's South Extension market.
translation.zh: ‎对赌坊庄家MK古普塔展开搜捕

translation.en: Who was M.K Gupta?
translation.zh: ‎谁是MK古普塔？

translation.en: No one knew what he looked like.
translation.zh: ‎没人知道他长什么样

translation.en: Now, would he have bodyguards? Would he have bouncers with him?
translation.zh: ‎他有保镖吗？他会让保镖随行吗？

translation.en: [Sawani] We went to his house, we searched his house.
translation.zh: ‎我们去了他家 搜查了他的房子

translation.en: We went to his relatives' places.
translation.zh: ‎我们去了他亲戚的家

translation.en: We found that he had a jewelry shop,
translation.zh: ‎我们发现他开了一家珠宝店

translation.en: which was being manned by his father.
translation.zh: ‎由他父亲打理

translation.en: [Krishnan] I found out from his neighbors,
translation.zh: ‎我从他的邻居那里了解到

translation.en: he did not mingle with people, he kept to himself.
translation.zh: ‎他不爱与人打交道 总是独来独往

translation.en: Obviously, I thought he had to do that,
translation.zh: ‎在我看来 考虑到他从事的职业

translation.en: given the line of business he was in.
translation.zh: ‎显然他不得不这么做

translation.en: [Sawani] The moment this news came on TV,
translation.zh: ‎电视新闻一经播出

translation.en: he went underground and was nowhere to be found.
translation.zh: ‎他就躲了起来 人间蒸发了

translation.en: But somewhere, he learnt that the CBI is really after him
translation.zh:
‎但在某个角落
‎他知道自己正被中央调查局搜捕

translation.en: and that they would do anything to get at him,
translation.zh: ‎并且会不惜一切代价找到他

translation.en: and the pressure was on him all the time to come out.
translation.zh:
‎所以他会一直
‎承受着是否要露面的压力

translation.en: [Neeraj Kumar] I have always been a cricket fan from my childhood.
translation.zh: ‎我从小就是板球迷

translation.en: I put great cricketers
translation.zh:
‎（尼拉杰库玛尔
‎中央调查局前任联席局长） ‎为国出征的伟大板球员

translation.en: who would serve the country on a high pedestal.
translation.zh: ‎在我心目中的形象是高大完美的

translation.en: But in 2000, an informant came up to me
translation.zh: ‎但在2000年 有个线人来找我说

translation.en: and said that someone wanted to surrender before me.
translation.zh: ‎有人想向我自首

translation.en: A guy called M.K Gupta.
translation.zh: ‎一个叫MK古普塔的人

translation.en: I said, "Why me?"
translation.zh: ‎我说：“为什么找我？”

translation.en: Because I was not inquiring into the matter.
translation.zh: ‎因为我不是负责调查的人

translation.en: So he said, "Sir, he has seen you in a public meeting
translation.zh:
‎他说：“长官
‎他在一场公众集会上见过你

translation.en: and somehow he feels that if he meets you,
translation.zh: ‎不知怎地 他就觉得如果跟你见面

translation.en: you can guide him."
translation.zh: ‎你可以指引他”

translation.en: I felt important. I am like… I am the chosen one.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉自己成了重要人物
‎我是被选中的人

translation.en: We decided to meet in a super deluxe hotel.
translation.zh: ‎我们决定在一间超级豪华的酒店见面

translation.en: I was very sure of the informant.
translation.zh: ‎我非常信任那名线人

translation.en: So, I went without any backup.
translation.zh: ‎所以没带任何后援

translation.en: And a very ordinary-looking person opened the door.
translation.zh: ‎一个外表很普通的人打开了门

translation.en: [in Hindi] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: ‎是的 先生

translation.en: [in English] Please come in.
translation.zh: ‎请进

translation.en: Then I suddenly see two more people in the room.
translation.zh: ‎然后我突然看到房间里还有两个人

translation.en: Then I became a little anxious.
translation.zh: ‎我开始感到不安

translation.en: So I took a long breath.
translation.zh: ‎所以我深吸了一口气

translation.en: And I said, "Why do you want to meet me?"
translation.zh: ‎说：“你为什么想见我？”

translation.en: He says…
translation.zh: ‎他说

translation.en: [in Hindi] "Sir, I am to blame for this entire fiasco."
translation.zh: ‎“先生 这一整场闹剧都是我的责任

translation.en: [in English] "I am at the root of all the problems."
translation.zh: ‎我是所有问题的根源”

translation.en: And as he began to talk,
translation.zh: ‎他开口说话的那一瞬间

translation.en: I realized that my tryst with corruption in cricket had commenced.
translation.zh:
‎我就意识到
‎我跟板球腐败丑闻之间的纠葛开始了

translation.en: He was telling me such secrets,
translation.zh: ‎他告诉我的秘密太过震撼

translation.en: I decided to take him back to the CBI headquarters.
translation.zh: ‎我决定把他带回中央调查局总部

translation.en: [Sawani] When we brought Mukesh Gupta into the CBI,
translation.zh:
‎我们把穆凯什古普塔
‎带进中央调查局时

translation.en: he was certainly scared.
translation.zh: ‎他非常害怕

translation.en: If he was to reveal the names of anybody,
translation.zh: ‎他一旦招出任何人的名字

translation.en: his life was in danger, definitely.
translation.zh: ‎肯定会有生命危险

translation.en: But we assured Mukesh Gupta,
translation.zh: ‎但我们向穆凯什古普塔保证

translation.en: "No harm will come to you once you tell us the truth."
translation.zh:
‎“只要你肯说出真相
‎我们保证不让你受到任何伤害”

translation.en: And finally, he was willing to tell us his story.
translation.zh: ‎最后 他终于说出了他的经历

translation.en: Mukesh Gupta was a graduate from one of the Delhi colleges.
translation.zh:
‎穆凯什古普塔
‎是德里其中一所大学的毕业生

translation.en: He was initially employed with a bank.
translation.zh: ‎他最初是在银行工作的

translation.en: [Kumar] When he would walk home,
translation.zh: ‎当他走路回家时

translation.en: at the road corner, he would watch people betting on cricket.
translation.zh: ‎会在街角看别人赌板球

translation.en: He had never played cricket himself,
translation.zh: ‎他本身从来没打过板球

translation.en: but in double-quick time,
translation.zh: ‎但很快他就掌握了

translation.en: he understood all the finer points of the game.
translation.zh: ‎板球比赛的所有要领

translation.en: [Sawani] At that point of time, he would also go and watch
translation.zh: ‎那个时候 他经常去当地球场

translation.en: kids playing cricket in the local grounds.
translation.zh: ‎看孩子们打板球

translation.en: [Kumar] He understood that if you spot somebody with talent,
translation.zh: ‎他意识到 如果发现了有天赋的孩子

translation.en: you can groom a youngster.
translation.zh: ‎可以从小培养他

translation.en: And that was when he met Ajay Sharma.
translation.zh: ‎就在那时 他遇到了阿杰沙玛

translation.en: [Ugra] Ajay Sharma was a boy from not a very wealthy family
translation.zh:
‎阿杰沙玛是在德里打球的
‎年轻男孩 来自一个

translation.en: playing in Delhi.
translation.zh: ‎并不富裕的家庭

translation.en: He plays a great innings, he scores a hundred,
translation.zh:
‎有次他打了一个精彩的回合
‎拿了100分

translation.en: someone puts hundred bucks in his pocket and says, "I'm so happy. I'm a fan."
translation.zh:
‎有人往他兜里塞了100美元
‎说：“我真开心 我是你的球迷”

translation.en: [Sawani] At the time, he didn't realize what was happening
translation.zh: ‎阿杰沙玛当时还不明就里

translation.en: and he felt elated that somebody was appreciating his game.
translation.zh:
‎只是非常激动
‎很高兴有人欣赏他的球技

translation.en: But bookies think long period.
translation.zh: ‎但庄家们都是长线思维

translation.en: They will cultivate a player for years and years
translation.zh: ‎他们会用数年时间培养一名球员

translation.en: before they come up with their first request.
translation.zh: ‎直到时机成熟 开始对其提出要求

translation.en: [bookie on tape, in Hindi] We meet them as any normal person would.
translation.zh: ‎（匿名庄家的声音） ‎我们和他们像普通人一样见面

translation.en: We don't tell them we are bookies.
translation.zh: ‎不会表明自己是赌坊的庄家

translation.en: You get to know their weaknesses.
translation.zh: ‎然后在接触中了解他们的弱点

translation.en: [in English] Gifts, parties, women…
translation.zh: ‎礼物、派对、女人…

translation.en: [in Hindi] Alcohol is very useful.
translation.zh: ‎酒精非常管用

translation.en: Once you have befriended them,
translation.zh: ‎一旦你和他们成为朋友

translation.en: they are willing to talk.
translation.zh: ‎他们就愿意向你倾诉

translation.en: Then you strike a deal.
translation.zh: ‎然后你借机跟他们达成交易

translation.en: [Kumar, in English] And Ajay Sharma rose to be a national cricketer.
translation.zh: ‎阿杰沙玛后来跻身国家板球队

translation.en: And M.K Gupta got so much inside information,
translation.zh: ‎MK古普塔得以获取很多内部消息

translation.en: he made lots and lots of money.
translation.zh: ‎赚得盆满钵满

translation.en: And he shared that money with Ajay Sharma.
translation.zh: ‎他会把赚来的钱分给阿杰沙玛

translation.en: [Sawani] Once you're in,
translation.zh: ‎一旦踏入了那个泥潭

translation.en: you know, it's like the insects who get into the wood-borer.
translation.zh: ‎就会越陷越深

translation.en: Then you are caught for life.
translation.zh: ‎你这辈子都难以自拔了

translation.en: Mukesh Gupta would say, "You've told me this, I paid you this."
translation.zh:
‎穆凯什古普塔会说
‎“你告诉我信息 我付你钱”

translation.en: Perhaps he would even be recording the conversation.
translation.zh: ‎他可能甚至会给对话录音

translation.en: He would be able to blackmail the player.
translation.zh: ‎从而勒索球员

translation.en: And it is Ajay Sharma who introduced Mukesh Gupta
translation.zh: ‎正是阿杰沙玛把穆凯什古普塔

translation.en: to no other person than the captain himself…
translation.zh: ‎介绍给了他当时的队长…

translation.en: Mohammed Azharuddin.
translation.zh: ‎穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁

translation.en: [commentator] That's straight down the ground. It's in the air…
translation.zh: ‎球即将落地时被击入空中…

translation.en: Azharuddin.
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁

translation.en: Azharuddin.
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁

translation.en: -Azharuddin. -Mohammed Azharuddin.
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁 ‎穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁

translation.en: [Sawani] That was a big revelation.
translation.zh: ‎那是一个重磅消息

translation.en: It was really, really at the top at that point of time.
translation.zh: ‎他是当时位于金字塔顶端的人物

translation.en: The icon for the country.
translation.zh: ‎是国民偶像

translation.en: And any allegation against him
translation.zh: ‎任何对他的指控

translation.en: could not be palatable to the Indian public.
translation.zh: ‎对印度民众而言都会难以接受

translation.en: Could Mukesh Gupta bribe somebody like Mohammed Azharuddin?
translation.zh:
‎穆凯什古普塔真的能收买
‎像穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁那样的人物吗？

translation.en: I felt the pressure to find out what is the truth.
translation.zh: ‎（1990-1999年间担任队长） ‎我感受到了压力 必须查明真相

translation.en: -[man in Hindi] Does the color look right? -It's fabulous.
translation.zh:
‎-颜色合适吗？
‎-这颜色很好 先生

translation.en: [woman] The color is lovely, but it's not jittering, right?
translation.zh: ‎很漂亮 但不会太晃眼吧？

translation.en: It's a summer color.
translation.zh: ‎这是夏天的颜色

translation.en: Had I worn a dark one, it'd have been awful in this heat.
translation.zh: ‎深色衣服太不适合这样的大热天了

translation.en: [in English] Azhar was never a communicative person.
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁不是一个健谈的人

translation.en: He's not somebody who can really tell you what he's thinking or feeling.
translation.zh:
‎他不会跟你敞开心扉
‎聊他的想法或者感受

translation.en: -This shirt is nice, right? -Very nice.
translation.zh:
‎-这件衬衣还不错吧？
‎-很棒

translation.en: I didn't wear a dark-colored shirt…
translation.zh: ‎我没穿深色衬衫…

translation.en: [in Hindi] But I hope it's not jittering.
translation.zh:
‎-可以吗？
‎-就是希望它不会太晃眼

translation.en: [in English] Reticent, reluctant, very nervous.
translation.zh: ‎沉默寡言、勉为其难、非常紧张

translation.en: When was the last time you cried?
translation.zh: ‎你上一次哭是什么时候？

translation.en: -Uh, cried? -Yeah.
-I don't think I cry. -You don't cry?
translation.zh:
‎-我从来不哭
‎-你不哭吗？

translation.en: I hardly cry.
translation.zh: ‎我几乎不会哭

translation.en: All that would disappear when he stepped on the ground.
translation.zh: ‎可到了球场上 他就犹如换了一个人

translation.en: -[commentator] Lovely shot. -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: ‎好球

translation.en: What timing, what grace, what beauty.
translation.zh: ‎时机精准、动作优美、精彩绝伦

translation.en: [commentator] And again…
translation.zh: ‎再一次…

translation.en: And then these wrists…
translation.zh: ‎他那双手腕一挥拍…

translation.en: It was like a slap on the ego of the bowler.
translation.zh:
‎就像在投球手的自尊心上
‎狠狠扇了一巴掌

translation.en: [commentator] Azharuddin is only dealing in fours.
translation.zh: ‎四分打是阿兹鲁丁的专长

translation.en: As if God made Azhar's wrists on a very leisurely afternoon,
translation.zh:
‎他那双手腕
‎宛如上帝在一个休闲的午后

translation.en: carving them to perfection.
translation.zh: ‎精心雕琢的完美杰作

translation.en: [commentator] There it is, a thoroughly deserved century for Mohammed Azharuddin.
translation.zh:
‎是的 穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁
‎拿下了当之无愧的100跑

translation.en: [Karri] I remember when he made a century on his debut,
translation.zh: ‎我记得他首战就取得了100跑

translation.en: then a second test and a second century.
translation.zh: ‎第二次试炼又取得100跑

translation.en: And then a third century.
translation.zh: ‎然后是第三个100跑

translation.en: Unbelievable. Unbelievable.
translation.zh: ‎难以置信

translation.en: He's a hero for the entire nation.
translation.zh: ‎他是整个国家的英雄

translation.en: I was, uh, 14 when Azhar came back after creating the world record.
translation.zh:
‎阿兹鲁丁创下了世界纪录
‎凯旋归来时 我才14岁 ‎（诺埃尔大卫
‎前印度板球队员）

translation.en: It was huge. It was massive.
translation.zh: ‎那场面十分壮观 声势浩大

translation.en: The whole Hyderabad was there, greeting him.
translation.zh: ‎全海得拉巴的人都去迎接他

translation.en: You are ours now. You're the son of Hyderabad.
translation.zh:
‎你现在是我们的骄傲了
‎你是海得拉巴的儿子

translation.en: I told myself, one day,

translation.zh: ‎穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁将桂冠带回了祖国

translation.zh: ‎你为什么在拍摄？我说了不许拍的

translation.zh: ‎去把录像交给电视台爆料吧

translation.zh: ‎但随着调查的深入

translation.zh: ‎我们发现了一些可疑之处

translation.en: [in Hindi] There is no need to film. Why are you still filming it?
translation.zh:
‎不需要录像

translation.zh: ‎在《堕落英雄》纪录片调查期间

translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁的名字总会突然出现

translation.zh: ‎有很多报道称阿兹鲁丁赚快钱

translation.en: of 10 lakhs here, 20 lakhs here,
translation.zh: ‎这里赚100万 那里赚200万

translation.en: taking a watch from here, buying a Mercedes.
translation.zh: ‎从这里买了块表 从那里买了辆奔驰

translation.zh: ‎关于那种交易的报道实在太多了

translation.zh: ‎其他球员 ‎感觉他的财产比应有的多

translation.zh: ‎他养成了奢侈的习惯

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎他想要高档手表

translation.zh: ‎他在孟买上流人士的

translation.en: in high circles.
translation.zh: ‎圈子里打转

translation.en: So, uh, obviously, all that needed money.
translation.zh: ‎显然这一切都需要钱

translation.en: [Kumar] M.K told me that he could trap Azhar
translation.zh: ‎MK告诉我 他给阿兹鲁丁下套

translation.en: with relative amount of ease
translation.zh: ‎相对轻松地就得手了

translation.en: because by then, Azhar's lifestyle had become such
translation.zh: ‎因为到那时 阿兹鲁丁的生活方式

translation.en: that he needed lots of money.
translation.zh: ‎已经需要大量金钱来维持了

translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁跟阿杰沙玛提到

translation.en: that he was in need of some money
translation.zh: ‎他需要一笔钱

translation.en: because his girlfriend was doing some fashion show.
translation.zh: ‎因为他的女朋友要举办时装秀

translation.en: His requirement was around, I think, one crore of rupees,
translation.zh: ‎他需要大概一千万卢比

translation.en: which was a huge, huge amount at that point of time.
translation.zh: ‎这在当时来说是一笔巨款

translation.en: Ajay Sharma threw the bait.
translation.zh: ‎阿杰沙玛抛出了诱饵

translation.en: "There is a person who could give you that sort of money."
translation.zh: ‎“有一个人能给你提供这笔钱”

translation.en: There was a meeting organized in Taj Palace Hotel in Delhi
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁和穆凯什古普塔的会面

translation.en: with Azharuddin and Mukesh Gupta.
translation.zh: ‎被安排在了德里的泰姬陵酒店

translation.en: Mukesh Gupta, being the clever guy he was,
translation.zh: ‎穆凯什古普塔十分精明

translation.en: offered to pay 50 lakh rupees on that same day,
translation.zh: ‎提出先在当日付给他500万卢比

translation.en: and give him the rest of the money a little later.
translation.zh: ‎稍后再把剩余的钱交给他

translation.en: But it was kind of obviously clear M.K expected a lot from Azhar.
translation.zh: ‎但很显然 MK会索要巨大的回报

translation.en: [bookie, in Hindi] To a bookie,
translation.zh:
‎对庄家而言
‎球队队长比任何球员都重要

translation.en: the captain is more important than any other player.
translation.zh:
‎对庄家而言
‎球队队长比任何球员都重要 ‎（匿名庄家的声音）

translation.en: Because a captain has the most information.
translation.zh: ‎因为队长掌握的信息最多

translation.en: If a bookie has a captain on his side, he makes the most money.
translation.zh: ‎拉拢了队长的庄家 能赚最多的钱

translation.en: [Sawani, in English] As a captain, Azharuddin was able to bring in
translation.zh: ‎身为队长 ‎阿兹鲁丁可以指挥球队的其他成员

translation.en: other team members to do his bidding.
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁可以指挥球队的其他成员

translation.en: Get players to underperform and therefore lose the match.
translation.zh: ‎令球员发挥失常 从而输掉比赛

translation.en: All these cricketers', you know, claim to fame
translation.zh: ‎这些板球选手之所以负有盛名

translation.en: is that they're playing for India. What an honor!
translation.zh:
‎就是他们为印度而战
‎多大的荣耀啊！

translation.en: And selling that honor? Shameful.
translation.zh: ‎出卖掉那份荣耀？太可耻了

translation.en: It definitely needed to be met with an iron hand.
translation.zh: ‎必须以铁腕手段加以惩治

translation.en: [Kumar] M.K's revelations were the backbone of the CBI inquiry.
translation.zh:
‎中央调查局
‎以MK的供词为基础进行了调查

translation.en: They recorded his statement
translation.zh: ‎他们给他录了口供

translation.en: and they found supporting evidence.
translation.zh: ‎并发现了相关佐证

translation.en: [Sawani] We picked up all the call records of Mohammed Azharuddin
translation.zh:
‎我们调取了
‎穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁的所有通话记录

translation.en: and they showed he had been talking to a number of bookies.
translation.zh: ‎记录显示他跟多名庄家有过对话

translation.en: Even talking to an underworld don.
translation.zh: ‎甚至还跟一名黑社会老大通过话

translation.en: Mukesh Gupta told us
translation.zh: ‎穆凯什古普塔告诉我们

translation.en: Mohammed Azharuddin was running a locker in the Taj Palace Hotel
translation.zh:
‎穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁
‎在泰姬陵酒店有一个储物柜

translation.en: where people would come and deposit money.
translation.zh: ‎会有人去把钱存在里面

translation.en: And this was corroborated by, you know, interviewing the hotel staff.
translation.zh: ‎此事从酒店员工的口中获得了证实

translation.en: He went shopping at the famous Harrods in England.
translation.zh: ‎他去英国著名的哈洛德百货购物

translation.en: All his bills were paid by somebody other than himself.
translation.zh: ‎所有账单都是其他人买的

translation.en: We, of course, found out it was one of the bookies.
translation.zh:
‎当然 我们经调查发现
‎付款人是其中一个庄家

translation.en: After collecting all this evidence, we were ready to call in Azharuddin.
translation.zh:
‎在收集了这些证据之后
‎我们准备好找阿兹鲁丁来问话了

translation.en: I had sat through the previous night
translation.zh: ‎我前一晚彻夜未眠

translation.en: strategizing on, you know, the sequence of questioning.
translation.zh: ‎坐着思考策略 筹划提问的顺序

translation.en: There was a little bit of, you know, anxiety there
translation.zh: ‎我心里有一点焦虑

translation.en: that let's not do anything wrong.
translation.zh: ‎想着绝对不能出错

translation.en: The captain of the team, he needs to be clean
translation.zh: ‎板球队的队长 必须持身端正

translation.en: and if he is not, then he needs to be brought to book.
translation.zh: ‎如若不然 就需要得到惩罚

translation.en: [Kumar] When Mohammed Azharuddin came to the CBI headquarters,
translation.zh:
‎当穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁
‎来到中央调查局的总部

translation.en: all hell broke loose.
translation.zh: ‎一时间群情沸腾

translation.en: [Krishnan] I clearly remember television crews, hordes of reporters.
translation.zh:
‎我清楚地记得
‎来了很多电视台的工作人员 ‎还有成群的记者

translation.en: Could Azhar be involved in corrupting the game?
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁究竟是否参与了比赛造假？

translation.en: Can't be. Azhar? No chance.
translation.zh: ‎不可能 阿兹鲁丁？绝对不可能

translation.en: That was the only thing which came into my mind.
translation.zh: ‎当时我心里就只有这么一个想法

translation.en: [in Hindi] They are trying to finish his career.
translation.zh: ‎他们想终结他的事业

translation.en: They want to shut him down.
translation.zh: ‎他们想毁了他

translation.en: [Sawani, in English] We have specific investigation rooms where you do interrogations.
translation.zh:
‎我们设有专门的调查室
‎在那里进行审问

translation.en: All questioning would be across the table.
translation.zh:
‎所有问话都会
‎在一张桌子上面对面地进行

translation.en: Most of the players who came into the CBI headquarters
translation.zh: ‎大多数进入中央调查局总部的球员

translation.en: had a scare on their face.
translation.zh: ‎脸上都浮现出惊恐的神色

translation.en: But there were a category of players who knew what they were doing.
translation.zh: ‎但有一类球员可以沉着应对

translation.en: I would put Mohammed Azharuddin in that category.
translation.zh: ‎穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁就是这一类人

translation.en: Azharuddin never answers a question straight.
translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁没有直截了当地回答问题

translation.en: Very rarely would he want to open his mouth.
translation.zh: ‎他很少开口说话

translation.en: Perhaps he had been advised, less you speak, the better.
translation.zh: ‎也许有人给过他建议 少说少错

translation.en: Mohammed Azharuddin actually stonewalled all queries.
translation.zh:
‎事实上 穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁
‎拒绝回答所有问题

translation.en: So, the CBI officials decided they must change tack.
translation.zh: ‎所以中央调查局的官员决定改变策略

translation.en: [Sawani] That's when we confronted him with the evidence we had.
translation.zh: ‎我们把掌握的证据摆在了他面前

translation.en: We started listing his properties,
translation.zh: ‎我们开始罗列他的财产

translation.en: fancy cars, watches.
translation.zh: ‎豪车、名表

translation.en: We showed him his call records.
translation.zh: ‎我们给他看了他的通话记录

translation.en: Even the SIM that was being used by him was provided by one of the bookies.
translation.zh:
‎就连他使用的手机卡
‎都是其中一名庄家提供的

translation.en: The threat was there that we have M.K sitting in the next room.
translation.zh: ‎我们威胁他说 MK就坐在隔壁房间

translation.en: If you are denying this, should we bring him in?
translation.zh: ‎如果你否认 我们可以带他过来

translation.en: [Krishnan] That was the turning point.
translation.zh: ‎审问迎来了转折点

translation.en: I think he broke down after that.
translation.zh: ‎我认为在那之后 他破防了

translation.en: [Sawani] And finally, he told us…
translation.zh: ‎最终 他告诉我们…

translation.en: [in Hindi] "Yes, I fixed this match."
translation.zh: ‎“是的 我参与了比赛造假”

translation.en: [in English] He was a broken man.
translation.zh: ‎他变得萎靡不振

translation.en: But I can't have any sympathy for a player who is tainted with match-fixing.
translation.zh: ‎但我无法同情参与比赛造假的球员

translation.en: Letting down his nation.
translation.zh: ‎辜负了祖国的信任

translation.en: Definitely no.
translation.zh: ‎我绝不会同情他

translation.en: People connect with the game of cricket personally.
translation.zh: ‎民众对板球比赛抱有强烈的个人情感

translation.en: They would cry. They would laugh. They are so passionate about this game.
translation.zh:
‎他们为之欢笑流泪
‎对这项赛事充满热情

translation.en: So, once we found
translation.zh: ‎所以 一旦我们发现

translation.en: that there was something wrong with this guy
translation.zh: ‎这位全民偶像

translation.en: who was their icon,
translation.zh: ‎出了问题

translation.en: they had every right to know.
translation.zh: ‎人民有权利知道真相

translation.zh: ‎今天在德里 体育部长公布了

translation.zh:
‎中央调查局75页纸的
‎“板球比赛造假案”调查报告

translation.zh:
‎板球向来被称颂为绅士的运动

translation.zh:

translation.zh:
‎中央调查局的结论是

translation.en: [woman] There should be a very real punishment.
translation.zh: ‎应该予以严惩

translation.zh: ‎我觉得这可谓罪大恶极

translation.zh: ‎除了我们本国的球员…

translation.zh: ‎…他还爆出了九位国际球员的名字

translation.zh:
‎我们还得出一个结论
‎板球赛的管理者… ‎（板球委员会严正处理了这一问题）

translation.zh: ‎（板球委员会严正处理了这一问题） ‎…几乎没做任何调查

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎当你听说你热爱和关注的比赛

translation.zh: ‎你投入了感情的比赛

translation.zh: ‎背后竟如此丑陋不堪 你会尤为愤怒

translation.zh: ‎你会怒火中烧

translation.en: How dare they?
translation.zh: ‎他们怎么敢这样？

translation.zh: ‎什么样的人会做出这种事？

translation.en: But then you realize you're part of a whole community
translation.zh:
‎可然后你意识到

translation.zh:
‎看不见偶像的所作所为

translation.zh: ‎停止比赛！绝不放过欺骗我们的人

translation.zh: ‎绝不放过欺骗我们的人

translation.zh:
‎对于比赛

translation.en: is that it has to be clean.
translation.zh: ‎它必须是真实的

translation.zh:
‎那必须是真实的竞技
‎而非事先安排好的虚假表演

translation.en: But the players broke that bone.
translation.zh: ‎但那些球员打破了这条底线

translation.en: That's dangerous.
translation.zh: ‎这很危险

translation.en: [in Hindi] Whoever messes with us won't be spared.
translation.zh: ‎绝不放过欺骗我们的人

translation.zh: ‎我们想看看

translation.en: can we register a criminal case against anybody?
translation.zh: ‎能否追究任何人的刑事责任

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎虽然赌博在印度是违法的

translation.zh: ‎但遗憾的是 比赛造假并非刑事犯罪

translation.zh: ‎所以我们不能对这些人

translation.en: that we couldn't take criminal action against these guys.
translation.zh: ‎提起刑事诉讼 我对此十分不满

translation.zh:
‎我知道很多人在事发后
‎就不再观看板球比赛了

translation.zh: ‎他们放弃了 不在乎了

translation.zh: ‎（板球委员会惩罚涉事球员） ‎印度板球界要想恢复平静

translation.zh: ‎板球委员会就必须惩戒涉事球员

translation.zh:
‎人们期望委员会严肃处理

translation.en: Cricketing world had to say to its fans,
translation.zh: ‎板球界的管理者必须向球迷们表态

translation.zh: ‎“不 我们绝不容忍任何人胡作非为

translation.zh: ‎我们会把一切扼杀在萌芽状态”

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎他必须被公开处刑

translation.en: to reassure everybody that the cricketing story is fine
translation.zh:
‎以安抚民众

translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁只是个例

translation.zh: ‎（M阿兹鲁丁） ‎在前队长穆罕默德阿兹鲁丁一案中

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎并参与了比赛造假

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎…已被取消所有板球比赛的参赛资格

translation.zh: ‎印度板球界最悲伤的时刻

translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁曾是板球界的代表人物

translation.zh: ‎在他的带领下打球是非常光荣的事

translation.zh: ‎他以身作则 是球员的表率

translation.zh: ‎他是一名斗士 他的目标只有赢

translation.zh: ‎我从来不相信那桩丑闻

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎阿兹鲁丁隐藏在海得拉巴城中

translation.zh: ‎他躲了起来

translation.zh: ‎缩进了壳里

translation.zh:
